blocks.name: modexp2m1d
blocks.content: The square of an integer which is -1 modulo a number greater than 1 is 1 modulo the same modulus. (Contributed by AV, 5-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm modexp2m1d(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmo, c1), nat1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat1, clt, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmo, c1), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c1)))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmo, c1), nat1, co(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), cmo, c1), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmo, c1), co(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), cmo, c1), co(co(c0, cmul, c0), cmo, c1), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmo, c1, co(c0, cmul, c0), w0)
  sqvald(c0, w0)
  zcnd(c0, w0)
  modmul12d(c0, c0, c1, cneg(nat1), cneg(nat1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), cz))
  neg1z()
  eqtrd(co(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), cmo, c1), nat1, co(nat1, cmo, c1), w0)
  oveq1d(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), cmo, c1, nat1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), nat1))
  neg1mulneg1e1()
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(nat1, cmo, c1), nat1), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c1))
  rpred(c1, w0)
  1mod(c1)
}

blocks.name: proththdlem
blocks.origin:
thm proththdlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)))
} = {
  mpd(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn)), wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn)), w3a(wcel(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cn), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn)))
  3jca(w0, wcel(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cn), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn))
  peano2nnd(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(nat1, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1))))
  syl5eqbr(co(nat1, cmin, nat1), clt, co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), nat0, w0)
  1m1e0()
  nngt0d(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), w0)
  ltsubaddd(nat1, nat1, co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), w0)
  1red(w0)
  nnred(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), w0)
  eqeltrd(co(co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cdiv, nat2), w0)
  oveq1d(co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2, co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), wcel(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cc))
  nncnd(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), w0)
  pncan1(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))
  mpbid(w0, wcel(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cdiv, nat2), cn), wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1))))
  sylc(w0, wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), w3a(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, c1), cz)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))
  3jca(w0, wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, c1), cz))
  nnzd(c2, w0)
  nnzd(co(nat2, cexp, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c1, cn))
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat2, cz))
  2z()
  iddvdsexp(nat2, c1)
  dvdsmultr2(nat2, c2, co(nat2, cexp, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(nat2, cdvds, co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), wcel(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cdiv, nat2), cn)), wcel(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cn), wcel(nat2, cn))
  nnmulcld(c2, co(nat2, cexp, c1), w0)
  nnexpcld(nat2, c1, w0)
  nnnn0d(c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat2, cn))
  2nn()
  nndivdvds(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), nat2)
  3anbi123d(wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn), wcel(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cn), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn))
  eleq1(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cn)
  breq2(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), nat1, clt)
  eleq1d(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn, co(co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2, co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)
}

blocks.name: proththd
blocks.content: Proth's theorem (1878). If P is a _Proth number_, i.e. a number of the form k2^n+1 with k less than 2^n, and if there exists an integer x for which x^((P-1)/2) is -1 modulo P, then P is prime. Such a prime is called a _Proth prime_. Like Pocklington's theorem (see ~ pockthg ), Proth's theorem allows for a convenient method for verifying large primes. (Contributed by AV, 5-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm proththd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprime))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, clt, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, cz, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pockthg(hs0, s0, c0, co(nat2, cexp, c1), c2, w0)
  eqtrd(c0, co(co(co(nat2, cexp, c1), cmul, c2), caddc, nat1), co(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), caddc, nat1, co(co(nat2, cexp, c1), cmul, c2), w0)
  mulcomd(c2, co(nat2, cexp, c1), w0)
  nncnd(c2, w0)
  nncnd(co(nat2, cexp, c1), w0)
  nnexpcld(nat2, c1, w0)
  nnnn0d(c1, w0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, cprime, w0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), wrex(s0, cz, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cgcd, c0), nat1)))))
  sylbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cprime)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), wrex(s0, cz, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cgcd, c0), nat1))), wceq(cv(hs0), nat2))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cprime)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(nat2, cprime), wcel(c1, cn))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cprime))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cprime)), wcel(nat2, cprime))
  2prm()
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn))
  prmdvdsexpb(cv(hs0), nat2, c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), nat2), wrex(s0, cz, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cgcd, c0), nat1)))))
  mpid(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2), wrex(s0, cz, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cgcd, c0), nat1))), wrex(s0, cz, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))
  ex(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2), wi(wrex(s0, cz, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))), wrex(s0, cz, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cgcd, c0), nat1)))))
  reximdva(s0, cz, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0)), wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cgcd, c0), nat1)))
  ex(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0)), wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cgcd, c0), nat1)))
  jca(wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cgcd, c0), nat1))
  eqtrd(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0), nat1, co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cexp, nat2), cmo, c0), wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmo, c0, co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cexp, nat2), wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))
  ad4ant13(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cexp, nat2)))
  eqtrd(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cexp, nat2), co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  eqcomd(co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cmul, nat2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  divcan1d(co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  nncnd(c0, w0)
  peano2cnm(c0)
  2cnd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  expmuld(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), nat2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  zcn(cv(s0))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wcel(nat2, cn0))
  2nn0()
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  modexp2m1d(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), c0, wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))
  adantr(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cz))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cz), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)))
  ancomd(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  anim1i(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  zexpcl(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  simp2d(w0, wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn))
  simpr(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0)))
  3eqtr3d(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cgcd, c0), nat1, co(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cmo, c0), cgcd, c0), co(co(co(cneg(nat1), cmin, nat1), cmo, c0), cgcd, c0), wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))
  oveq1d(co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cmin, nat1), cmo, c0), cgcd, c0, co(co(cneg(nat1), cmin, nat1), cmo, c0), wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))
  modsub12d(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), nat1, c0, cneg(nat1), nat1, wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))
  adantr(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cr))
  zred(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  renegcld(nat1, wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))
  1red(wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cmo, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmo, c0))))

blocks.name: 5tcu2e40
